pandaEditor.gizmos package¶

Submodules¶

pandaEditor.gizmos.axis module¶

class pandaEditor.gizmos.axis.Axis(name, vector, colour, planar=False, default=False)[source]¶

Bases: NodePath

AddCollisionSolid(collSolid, pos=LPoint3f(0, 0, 0), sizeStyle=1)[source]¶

Add a collision solid to the axis and move it into position.

AddGeometry(geom, pos=LPoint3f(0, 0, 0), colour=None, highlight=True, sizeStyle=1)[source]¶

Add geometry to represent the axis and move it into position. If the geometry is a line make sure to call setLightOff or else it won’t look right.

Deselect()[source]¶

Reset the colour of the axis to the original colour and flag as being unselected.

Highlight()[source]¶

Highlight the axis by changing it’s colour.

Select()[source]¶

Changed the colour of the axis to the highlight colour and flag as being selected.

SetSize(size)[source]¶

Change the size of the gizmo. This isn’t just the same as scaling all the geometry and collision - sometimes this just means pushing the geometry along the axis instead.

Unhighlight()[source]¶

Remove the highlight by resetting to the axis colour.

pandaEditor.gizmos.base module¶

class pandaEditor.gizmos.base.Base(name, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: NodePath, SingleTask

AcceptEvents()[source]¶

Bind all events for the gizmo.

AttachNodePaths(nps)[source]¶

Attach node paths to the gizmo. This won’t affect the node’s position in the scene graph, but will transform the objects with the gizmo.

GetAxis(collEntry)[source]¶

Iterate over all axes of the gizmo, return the axis that owns the solid responsible for the collision.

GetAxisPoint(axis)[source]¶

Return the point of intersection for the mouse picker ray and the axis in the gizmo root node space.

GetMousePlaneCollisionPoint(pos, nrml)[source]¶

Return the collision point of a ray fired through the mouse and a plane with the specified normal.

GetSelectedAxis()[source]¶

Return the selected axis of the gizmo.

OnMouse2Down()[source]¶

Continue transform operation if user is holding mouse2 but not over the gizmo.

OnMouseUp()[source]¶

Set the dragging flag to false and reset the size of the gizmo on the mouse button is released.

OnNodeMouse1Down(planar, collEntry)[source]¶
OnNodeMouseLeave(collEntry)[source]¶

Called when the mouse leaves the the collision object. Remove the highlight from any axes which aren’t selected.

OnNodeMouseOver(collEntry)[source]¶

Highlights the different axes as the mouse passes over them.

OnStart()[source]¶

Starts the gizmo adding the task to the task manager, refreshing it and deselecting all axes except the default one.

OnStop()[source]¶

Stops the gizmo by hiding it and removing it’s update task from the task manager.

OnUpdate(task)[source]¶

Update method called every frame. Run the transform method if the user is dragging, and keep it the same size on the screen.

Refresh()[source]¶

If the gizmo has node paths attached to it then move the gizmo into position, set its orientation and show it. Otherwise hide the gizmo.

ResetAxes()[source]¶

Reset the default colours and flag as unselected for all axes in the gizmo.

SetSize(factor)[source]¶

Used to scale the gizmo by a factor, usually by 2 (scale up) and 0.5 (scale down). Set both the new size for the gizmo also call set size on all axes.

Transform()[source]¶

Override this method to provide the gizmo with transform behavior.

pandaEditor.gizmos.constants module¶

pandaEditor.gizmos.manager module¶

class pandaEditor.gizmos.manager.Manager(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Object

AddGizmo(gizmo)[source]¶

Add a gizmo to be managed by the gizmo manager.

AttachNodePaths(nps)[source]¶

Attach node paths to be transformed by the gizmos.

GetActiveGizmo()[source]¶

Return the active gizmo.

GetGizmo(name)[source]¶

Find and return a gizmo by name, return None if no gizmo with the specified name exists.

GetGizmoLocal(name)[source]¶

Return the gizmos local mode.

IsDragging()[source]¶

Return True if the active gizmo is in the middle of a dragging operation, False otherwise.

RefreshActiveGizmo()[source]¶

Refresh the active gizmo if there is one.

SetActiveGizmo(name)[source]¶

Stops the currently active gizmo then finds the specified gizmo by name and starts it.

SetGizmoLocal(name, mode)[source]¶

Set all gizmo local modes, then refresh the active one.

SetLocal(val)[source]¶
SetSize(factor)[source]¶

Resize the gizmo by a factor.

ToggleLocal()[source]¶

Toggle all gizmos local mode on or off.

Highlights the different axes as the mouse passes over them.

SetSize(factor)[source]¶

Used to scale the gizmo by a factor, usually by 2 (scale up) and 0.5 (scale down). Set both the new size for the gizmo also call set size on all axes.

Transform()[source]¶

Override this method to provide the gizmo with transform behavior.

Update(task)[source]¶

Run OnUpdate method - return task.cont if there was no return value.
